Name: Ja-Mora
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Ja-mora of this fruity champagne cocktail you drink, ja-mora you'll like it.
History: Created by Jamie Terrell and Andres Masso in 1998. Named after 'mora', the Spanish for blackberry. The 'j' and 'a' stand for the names of its two creators.
Nutrition: One serving of Ja-Mora contains 132 calories
